bug.author: nsubiron
bug.description:
How to reproduce
Add at least two SceneCaptureToDiskCameras to the scene Set their "Save to Folder" different for each camera Set their "Post Process Effect" different for each camera Play
Each camera saves in its own folder but the resulting images seem to be somehow mixed up.

comments.comment: Ok <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nsubiron>@nsubiron</denchmark-link> the problem is that the Render Target is being shared because the property is defined as Transient. I've also fixed a bug in the constructor naming, btw, we will need to change this SaveToFolder to be checked in runtime because it is different in production than in editor.
